definition: to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: If serious subsequences are caused, the infringing organ shall pay a proper amount of consolation money for the mental distress.
sentences.chinese: 造成嚴重後果的，應當支付相應的精神損害撫慰金。
